params.param: The type of the content object.
Delimeter of the CSV file; default is ';'
Charset of the CSV file; default is 'UTF-8'
Comma seperated list of zero based numbers of the ID-columns; default is '0'

If true and if there is only a single ID column, the ID column will be used as ContentUrl; default is 'false' Example of an generated ContentUrl: iqser://iqsercsvplugin.sf.net/[TYPE]/[ID-COLUMN-VALUE-1]/[ID-COLUMN-VALUE-2]/[...]
Comma seperated list of zero-based column numbers that will become key attributes; default is null (empty)
Comma seperated list of zero-based column numbers that will be ignored; default is null (empty)
Comma seperated list of zero-based column numbers that contain timestamps; default is null (empty)
If 'true' and if 'column.fulltext' equals '-1', the raw record without delimeters is used as fulltext.
Zero based number of the column with the row's modification timestamp; default is -1 (not specified)
If 'true', computes a hash over the raw record and uses it as the contentUrl, e.g. iqser://iqsercsvplugin.sf.net/...?SHA-1=fdf004282e243a3cbe13433bbe434d40ef85bf25; default is 'false'
Digest Algorithm for computing a contentUrl based on a hash; default is 'SHA-1'
An associative JSON array that contains a mapping from column numbers to multiValue delimiters. A delimiter can be any regular expression; default is '{}'
